actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing Representative Nielson of Utah to the Committee on Education and Labor, and Representative Schaefer of Colorado to the Committee on Government Operations and the Committee on Small Business.

summary.text: Elects Representative Howard Nielson, of Utah, to the Committee on Education and Labor, and Representative Dan Schaefer, of Colorado, to the Committee on Government Operations and the Committee on Small Business.

titles.title: A resolution electing Representative Nielson of Utah to the Committee on Education and Labor, and Representative Schaefer of Colorado to the Committee on Government Operations and the Committee on Small Business.
